body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Christopher Flores and the customer's name is Lauren Bennett.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Christopher Flores, and I am with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Christopher! I'm Lauren Bennett. I have some questions about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Lauren! I'd be happy to help you with your questions. What information are you looking for?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I'm interested in purchasing a new motorcycle, but I'm not sure which model to choose.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help you with that! Do you have a specific style of motorcycle in mind, or are you open to suggestions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm pretty open right now. I would like something that is both stylish and reliable.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sounds good! Before we dive into that, could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure! My zip code is one zero two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And for our records, could I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Lauren. I appreciate your patience. Let's get started on finding you the perfect motorcycle!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Lauren. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out!
